original_text: God accepts people as right with himself because Jesus Christ did what God wanted. God accepts every person who believes in Christ. It is the same way for everyone, whether they are Jews or Gentiles. God accepts people as right with himself because Jesus Christ did what God wanted. God accepts every person who believes in Christ. It is the same way for everyone, whether they are Jews or Gentiles. God accepts people as right with himself because Jesus Christ did what God wanted. God accepts every person who believes in Christ. It is the same way for everyone, whether they are Jews or Gentiles. God accepts people as right with himself because Jesus Christ did what God wanted. God accepts every person who believes in Christ. It is the same way for everyone, whether they are Jews or Gentiles.
korean_text: 곧 예수 그리스도를 믿음으로 말미암아 모든 믿는 자에게 미치는 하나님의 의니 차별이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: God accepts people as right with himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들을 자신과 옳은 관계로 받아들이신다

sentences.original_text: because Jesus Christ did what God wanted
sentences.korean_translation: 예수 그리스도께서 하나님의 뜻대로 행하셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: God accepts every person
who believes in Christ
It is the same way for everyone
whether they are Jews or Gentiles
